text:
Question 161) The monthly number of tickets of a particular airline increased last year under the following conditions: in January 33 000 tickets were sold; in February, 34 500; In March, 36 000. This growth pattern remains for subsequent months.
How many tickets were sold by this company in July last year?
A) 38 000
B) 40 500
C) 41 000
D) 42 000
E) 48 000
